{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10945v1", "title": "Tighter Bounds on Non-clairvoyant Parallel Machine Scheduling with
  Prediction to Minimize Makespan", "summary": "This paper investigates the non-clairvoyant parallel machine scheduling
problem with prediction, with the objective of minimizing the makespan.
Improved lower bounds for the problem and competitive ratios of online
algorithms with respect to the prediction error are presented for both the
non-preemptive and preemptive cases on m identical machines.", "main_category": "cs.DS", "categories": "cs.DS", "published": "2025-04-15T07:48:14Z"}
